name: PUNKTATO MADNESS
description:
This is an attempt to the Hardcore Punk Jam. A potato climbs and has to avoid flying traps and a knife!

Use W to jump. Hold to jump higher. 

A and D to go left and right. Avoid threaths and reach the top!

Made by

  • François Audet
  • Catherine Dicaire
  • Vanessa Dubreuil
  • Antoine Flynn
  • Maxim Morin
  • Kaelen Perchuk
  • Simon Tremblay
  • Jean François Turgeon
  • Claudine Vandry
